3d3302a9-9260-42ca-942c-70e13f27153f.notes: -1 Reaction; -2 to social skills with @Parent Races@

37f8f024-7a3e-455e-b13f-f7176b9d9ad7.notes: -2 Reaction; -2 to social skills; -3 to helpful clerical spells

ddf5310c-ea6f-49c3-affa-c3113aecdaf6.notes: -3 reaction; -6 to skills; Denied entry to town on 9 or less

5a6c8956-a735-4d2d-92c3-7ae8fe25a4d6.notes: -2 reaction; -4 to skills; Denied entry to town on 6 or less

51eea4d0-e85d-444e-8486-18533f816682.name: Alternate Benefit
51eea4d0-e85d-444e-8486-18533f816682.notes: Bonus to notice intruders, etc in woodland where you've lived from 6-level months.

8de7cbf8-a4b1-4381-b536-32158e44252b.name: Alternate Benefit
8de7cbf8-a4b1-4381-b536-32158e44252b.notes: Bonus to will for Extra Effort when digging, HT on failure at such, and all rolls to avoid disasters in mines

d3851797-169b-4b27-9928-4cd98aee7983.name: Reaction Bonus
d3851797-169b-4b27-9928-4cd98aee7983.notes: Those who benefit directly from your skills

ce0f7396-2300-4a3b-87e8-95a9d5babfa7.name: Alternate Benefit
ce0f7396-2300-4a3b-87e8-95a9d5babfa7.notes: Success at an appropriate covered skill lets you scround equipment for another skill and eliminates level of the penalty for improvised equipment. Shift rolls by level to avoid harm from tampering with mundane mechanisms.
